actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to pay the funds appropriated by this Act to the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs for the purchase of a parcel of land adjacent to the Santa Fe, New Mexico, National Cemetery.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to the Administrator of Veterans Affairs the funds appropriated by this Act for the purchase of land adjacent to the Santa Fe, New Mexico, National Cemetery.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to pay the funds appropriated by this Act to the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs for the purchase of a parcel of land adjacent to the Santa Fe, New Mexico, National Cemetery.
